title: [Medicine] Scientists screened 136 safe-in-man broad-spectrum antivirals against the SARS-CoV-2 infection and identified nelfinavir, salinomycin, amodiaquine, obatoclax, emetine and homoharringtonine were successful. They found that a combination of nelfinavir and amodiaquine exhibited the highest synergy.
[Epidemiology] Pediatric Cases of Mysterious Inflammation Linked to Coronavirus Surge in Arizona; Doctors Urge Parents to Know its Warning Signs
